title: Run Flatten with yarn scripts will generate wrong flattened file

body:
Hi @tdergouzi, sorry for not responding sooner. What's happening here is that `yarn` sends some of its output to stdout, and so the `>` operator adds those lines to the flattened file too.

We should probably add a parameter to the flatten task that lets you pass a file where the flattened code should be created. I opened https://github.com/NomicFoundation/hardhat/issues/4027 to track that.
